程序包 game

  • 类概要
    类 说明
    Application
    The main class for the Jurassic World game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    Floor
    A class that represents the floor inside a building.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    GameWeaponItem  
    LordOfCinder
    The boss of Design o' Souls FIXME: This boss is Boring.
    MeleeWeapon  
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    ResetManager
    A global Singleton manager that does soft-reset on the instances.
    SwapWeaponAction
    An action to swap weapon (new weapon replaces old weapon).
    Undead
    An undead minion.
    Valley
    The gorge or endless gap that is dangerous for the Player.
    Wall  
    WanderBehaviour
